DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of this study is evaluate the effect of different intensities of exercise (moderate vs. intense) on the daily energy expenditure in overweight adolescents.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Different Intensities of Exercise on Daily Energy Expenditure With Physical Activity in Overweight Boys
DOC.detailed_description: The specific objectives are: 1. Assess and quantify the existence of compensatory effect of exercise on subsequent physical activity. 2. Compare the amount of daily physical activity in adolescents subjected to different protocols of training intensity.
DOC.criteria: overweight 6th and 7th grades students consent form signed by parents / tutors diabetes mellitus hypertension or reported cardiovascular disease
